LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_cumflation_d: Enables Cum-flation and other vaginal fluid insertion Hediffs.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_cumflation_modifier: Modifies how much fluid is necessary for a full inflation. Higher number mean more fluid necessary, lower numbers less.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_stuffing_des: Enables Cum-stuffing and other oral+anal fluid insertion Hediffs.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_stuffing_modifier_d: Modifies how much fluid is necessary for a full stuffing. Higher number mean more fluid necessary, lower numbers less.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_bukkake_desc: Enables Bukkake and other Fluid-based body-covers.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_bukkake_modifier_de: Modifies how much fluid is necessary for a full covering. Higher number mean more fluid necessary, lower numbers less.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_fluid_gather: When enabled, cleaning fluid-filth can spawn respective items (Chance based on FluidGatheringDefs).
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_max_gathering_check: The gathering-items use a max-distance to find items in their room. High values might lead to performance issues when placed outside or in big, crowded rooms.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_progressing_: When enabled, the pawns will gain thoughts on Fluid-Consumption, depending on their preferences and how much of it they consumed already.
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_oscillation_: When enabled, Hediffs are added post-sex and on celibacy that change fluid-amount (Blue balls, drained and wet).
LanguageData.cumpilation_settings_enable_debug_loggin: When enabled, more detailed logging will take place.
